column3: It is good practice to always first check for possible duplicates.\nClosing.\n

@jonasschnelli  I did not realize this was a duplicate. Thanks for the references to the former commits @paveljanik As a comment though, is not the blocksize 1MB? Why then are we artificially making it lower? This commit I have submitted along with others is not changing the blocksize nor forking anything, tis only correcting the default settings to be match with the rules of the protocol (of 1MB
@Cannon-Ciota Please read both duplicates. There are enough arguments against this change at this time already. if you have new argument, please bring it.\n
